example.description: Returns details about the specified customer gateway.

example.code:
PS C:\>$filter1 = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.Filter PS C:\>$filter1.Name = "ip-address" PS C:\>$filter1.Values = "12.1.2.3"
PS C:\>$filter2 = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.Filter PS C:\>$filter2.Name = "state" PS C:\>$filter2.Values = @( "pending", "available" )
PS C:\>Get-EC2CustomerGateway -Filter @( $filter1, $filter2 )
example.description: This example uses filters to return the details of any customer gateway you own whose IP address is 12.1.2.3, and whose state is either pending or available.
